title: Gensou Suikoden I - Water Blue (Doujinshi)
description:
Focused on Ted and Tir in one half and Flik, Odessa and Tir in the second half.

Two short stories by two different artists, both containing a lot of inner monologues by their respective narrators, Ted and Odessa. Ted is, surprisingly, a bit of a brat in the first story, and the second hints at romance between Flik and Odessa.
